Their recommendations for days out and restaurants were spot on. Nothing  is too much trouble and always with a smile. The hotel is beautifully cared for and breakfasts very good ( delicious croissant). The hotel is situated about 10- 15 minutes from town but it is a lovely walk past gorgeous countryside and through public gardens to Sarlat. Up hill on the way back but no bad thing after a meal out ! A memorable stay in the beautiful Dordogne.

The city is 10 min away (walking at a good pace) but its really steep at times - and unfortunately the facility makes it a bit difficult to eat / picnic at the location (no trash/ one fridge for everyone / no kitchen etc). That would be great if  this could be improved.
